article.title: An Approach to the Measurement of Use and Cost of a Large Academic ResearchLibrary System: A Report of a Study Done at Columbia University Libraries
article.author: Mount, EllisFasana, Paul
article.text: A description of the methodology used in collecting performance data in a large academic research library is given.. Twelve types of surveys used to measure and evaluate users, services, and materials were developed and conducted during the period 1968/69 at Columbia University libraries and later evaluated.. Sample results are included.. Costs of providing research services were found to be 64 percent versus 36 percent for instructional services..
